Package examblock.model

Class ExamBlockModel

Object
ExamBlockModel
public class ExamBlockModel extends Object
The M in the MVC model - this is the source of truth for all the data in the app

    • saveToFile

      public boolean saveToFile(Registry registry, String filename, String title, double version)
      Save a registry to disk. This file format has to match the format expected by loadFromFile. If the file cannot be successfully saved, log a message to the console and return false.

      Typically the data file structure looks like this, although you're free to design your own.
      • Title: ExamBlock Data 2025
      • Version: 1.0
      • [Begin]
      • subjects (see SubjectList, Subject)
      • units (see UnitList, Unit)
      • students (see StudentList, Student)
      • exams (see ExamList, Exam)
      • rooms (see RoomList, Room)
      • venues (see VenueList, Venue)
      • sessions (see SessionList, Session)
      • [End]
      Parameters:
      registry - the registry to save
      filename - the filename to save to. If null, a dialog is shown to ask for a filename.
      title - the Exam Block title
      version - the current version number
      Returns:
      true is file saved, otherwise false

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile()
      Load a registry from disk. This version will prompt the user for a file to load. For the details of the file format, see loadFromFile(Registry, String).

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(Registry registry, String filename)
      Load a registry from disk. This file format has to match the format written by saveToFile. If the file cannot be loaded due to an IOException or RuntimeException, terminates the app.

      Typically the data file structure looks like this, although you're free to design your own.
      • Title: ExamBlock Data 2025
      • Version: 1.0
      • [Begin]
      • subjects (see SubjectList, Subject)
      • units (see UnitList, Unit)
      • students (see StudentList, Student)
      • exams (see ExamList, Exam)
      • rooms (see RoomList, Room)
      • venues (see VenueList, Venue)
      • sessions (see SessionList, Session)
      • [End]
      Parameters:
      registry - the registry to fill
      filename - the filename to load from
